usa: The McCarran–Walter Act was enacted, with the House and Senate overriding President Truman's veto of the bill.<sup id="cite_ref-267" class="reference">[267]</sup>

United States presidential election, 1952: Five-Star General and former Chief of Staff of the United States Army Dwight D. Eisenhower was elected President, defeating Illinois Governor Adlai Stevenson II.[268]
